type="tns:orderProperties"/> <xs:element name="statusLabel" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="territoryCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="totalDiscount" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="totalPrice" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="totalTax" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="totalWeight" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderProperties"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderProperty" type="tns:property"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> name="orderPackages"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderPackage" type="tns:orderPackage"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderPackage"> <xs:sequence> type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="packageItems" type="tns:packageItems"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="quantity" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="packageItem" type="tns:packageItem"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="packageItem"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="productDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="productId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="itemProperties" type="tns:packageItemProperties"/> <xs:element name="quantity" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="quantityUnitId" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="tax" type="xs:decimal"/> <xs:element name="taxRate" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="type" type="tns:property"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderAddresses"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderAddress" type="tns:orderAddress"/> type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderComments"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="orderComment" type="tns:orderComment"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderComment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="comment" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="type" type="xs:string"/> name="orderId" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="createOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createOrderResponse" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="createOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> def orderTypes = ["STDDELIVERY","FASTTRACK","CONTRACT"] def paymentTakenFlag = ["true","false"]
random = new Random() def i = random.nextInt(5) def j = random.nextInt(2)
propTestStep = myTestCase.getTestStepByName("CreateOrder Properties") // get the Property TestStep //propTestStep.setPropertyValue("territoryCode", territoryCodes[random.nextInt(263)].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("firstName", firstNames[random.nextInt(firstNames.size())].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("middleName", middleNames[random.nextInt(middleNames.size())].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("lastName", lastNames[random.nextInt(lastNames.size())].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("title", titles[random.nextInt(titles.size())].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("city", cities[random.nextInt(cities.size())].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("packageItems", packageItems[i].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("OrderPackages", orderPackages[i].toString()) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("i", (i + 1).toString()) orderType = orderTypes[random.nextInt(orderTypes.size())].toString() orderType = 'FASTTRACK' orderType = 'STDDELIVERY' propTestStep.setPropertyValue("orderType", orderType)
def orderNumber = propTestStep.getPropertyValue( "orderNumber" )
randomItemPrice = Math.floor(Math.random() * 100) itemPrice1 = randomItemPrice + 6.55 itemPrice2 = randomItemPrice + 33.78 itemPrice3 = randomItemPrice + 76.76 itemPrice4 = randomItemPrice + 12.89 itemPrice5 = randomItemPrice + 4.99 propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemPrice1", itemPrice1.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemPrice2", itemPrice2.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemPrice3", itemPrice3.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemPrice4", itemPrice4.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemPrice5", itemPrice5.toString().take(6))
if (i + 1 == 1) { packagePrice = itemPrice1 } else if(i + 1 == 2) { packagePrice = itemPrice1 + itemPrice2 } else if(i + 1 == 3) { packagePrice = itemPrice1 + itemPrice2 + itemPrice3 } else if(i + 1 == 4) { packagePrice = itemPrice1 + itemPrice2 + itemPrice3 + itemPrice4 } else { packagePrice = itemPrice1 + itemPrice2 + itemPrice3 + itemPrice4 + itemPrice5 } propTestStep.setPropertyValue("packagePrice", packagePrice.toString().take(6)) totalPrice = packagePrice.toBigDecimal() totalPrice = packagePrice.multiply(i + 1) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("totalPrice", totalPrice.toString().take(6)) paymentTaken = paymentTakenFlag[random.nextInt(paymentTakenFlag.size())] paymentTaken == 'true' if (paymentTaken == 'true') { paymentAmount = totalPrice;// - totalPrice * 0.1; } else { paymentAmount = 0; } propTestStep.setPropertyValue("paymentAmount", paymentAmount.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("paymentTAken", paymentTaken)
itemTax1 = (itemPrice1*10/100) itemTax2 = (itemPrice2*10/100) itemTax3 = (itemPrice3*10/100) itemTax4 = (itemPrice4*10/100) itemTax5 = (itemPrice5*10/100) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemTax1", itemTax1.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemTax2", itemTax2.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemTax3", itemTax3.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemTax4", itemTax4.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemTax5", itemTax5.toString().take(6))
if (i + 1 == 1) { packageTax = itemTax1 } else if(i + 1 == 2) { packageTax = itemTax1 + itemTax2 } else if(i + 1 == 3) { packageTax = itemTax1 + itemTax2 + itemTax3 } else if(i + 1 == 4) { packageTax = itemTax1 + itemTax2 + itemTax3 + itemTax4 } else { packageTax = itemTax1 + itemTax2 + itemTax3 + itemTax4 +itemTax5 } propTestStep.setPropertyValue("packageTax", packageTax.toString().take(6))
totalTax = packageTax.toBigDecimal() totalTax = packageTax.multiply(i + 1) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("totalTax", totalTax.toString().take(6))
packageDiscount = (packagePrice*5/100) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("packageDiscount", packageDiscount.toString().take(6)) totalDiscount = packageDiscount.toBigDecimal() totalDiscount = packageDiscount.multiply(i + 1) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("totalDiscount", totalDiscount.toString().take(6))
randomItemWeight = Math.floor(Math.random() * 30) itemWeight1 = randomItemWeight + 1.55 itemWeight2 = randomItemWeight + 3.65 itemWeight3 = randomItemWeight + 9.32 itemWeight4 = randomItemWeight + 6.78 itemWeight5 = randomItemWeight + 4.99 propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemWeight1", itemWeight1.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemWeight2", itemWeight2.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemWeight3", itemWeight3.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemWeight4", itemWeight4.toString().take(6)) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("itemWeight5", itemWeight5.toString().take(6))
if (i + 1 == 1) { packageWeight = itemWeight1 } else if(i + 1 == 2) { packageWeight = itemWeight1 + itemWeight2 } else if(i + 1 == 3) { packageWeight = itemWeight1 + itemWeight2 + itemWeight3 } else if(i + 1 == 4) { packageWeight = itemWeight1 + itemWeight2 + itemWeight3 + itemWeight4 } else { packageWeight = itemWeight1 + itemWeight2 + itemWeight3 + itemWeight4 + itemWeight5 } propTestStep.setPropertyValue("packageWeight", packageWeight.toString().take(6)) totalWeight = packageWeight.toBigDecimal() totalWeight = packageWeight.multiply(i + 1) propTestStep.setPropertyValue("totalWeight", totalWeight.toString().take(6))
orderNumber = (orderNumber as Integer) + 1; propTestStep.setPropertyValue("orderNumber", orderNumber.toString())
//log.info territoryCodes[random.nextInt(24)] //log.info firstNames //log.info titles[random.nextInt(lastNames.size())] //log.info cities[random.nextInt(51)] //log.info packageItems[i] //log.info orderPackages[i] //log.info i + 1 log.info itemPrice1 log.info itemPrice2 log.info itemPrice3 log.info itemPrice4 log.info itemPrice5 log.info packagePrice log.info totalPrice log.info itemTax1 log.info itemTax2 log.info itemTax3 log.info itemTax4 log.info itemTax5 log.info packageTax log.info totalTax log.info packageDiscount log.info totalDiscount log.info itemWeight1 log.info itemWeight2 log.info itemWeight3 log.info itemWeight4 log.info itemWeight5 log.info packageWeight log.info orderTypes[random.nextInt(orderTypes.size())].toString() log.info paymentTaken log.info paymentAmount

con:request.name: CreateOrder
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:sei="http://sei.ws.oms.brandpath.com/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <sei:createOrder> <authentication> <channelTag>BPONLINE</channelTag> <clientTag>BRANDPATH</clientTag> <siteTag>BPCREFSITE</siteTag> <territoryCode>GBR</territoryCode> </authentication> <order> <currency>GBP</currency> <customerOrderReference>BP10120WB${orderNumber}</customerOrderReference> <language>EN</language> <orderReference>BP${orderNumber}</orderReference> <paymentMethod>PAYPAL</paymentMethod> <placedDate>${=new java.text.SimpleDateFormat("yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS").format(new Date())}</placedDate> <orderProperties> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderProperty> <name>FIRSTNAME</name> <value>${#firstName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>MIDDLENAME</name> <value>${middleName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>LASTNAME</name> <value>${#lastName}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>TITLE</name> <value>${#title}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>PHONENUMBER</name> <value>7772525516</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>EMAIL</name> <value>andrei.popa@pjmedia.co.uk</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>DOB</name> <value>22-03-1996</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>TELCONTACT</name> <value>7772424555</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>TELWORK</name> <value>7772424555</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>OCCUPATION</name> <value>software engineer in test</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>EMPLOYMENT</name> <value>yes</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>COMPANYNAME</name> <value>Brandpath</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>COMPANYTYPE</name> <value>The best</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>COMPANYNUMBER</name> <value>1234567890011</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>PAYMENTREFERENCE</name> <value>PAYMENT${orderNumber}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>ACCOUNTHOLDER</name> <value>testAccount</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>BANKNAME</name> <value>HSBC</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>BRANCHIDENTIFIER</name> <value>Sydney</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>ACCOUNTNUMBER</name> <value>20203455667245</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>PAYMENTTAKEN</name> <value>${paymentTaken}</value> </orderProperty> <orderProperty> <name>PAYMENTAMOUNT</name> <value>${paymentAmount}</value> </orderProperty> </orderProperties> <totalDiscount>${totalDiscount}</totalDiscount> <totalPrice>${totalPrice}</totalPrice> <totalTax>${totalTax}</totalTax> <totalWeight>${totalWeight}</totalWeight> <type>${orderType}</type> </order> <orderPackages>${OrderPackages}</orderPackages> <orderAddresses> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderAddress> <city>${#city}</city> <line1>43 High Street</line1> <!--Optional:--> <line2>Corner building</line2> <!--Optional:--> <postcode>${postcode}</postcode> <!--Optional:--> <region>Bucks</region> <territoryCode>ROU</territoryCode> <type>DELIVERY</type> </orderAddress> </orderAddresses> <!--Optional:--> <orderComments> <!--1 or more repetitions:--> <orderComment> <comment>YES Comment!</comment> <type>CUSTOMER</type> </orderComment> </orderComments> </sei:createOrder> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
